-MiBsBKGWFEU-yluJkL-.title: Create Five Houses for users to join
-MiBsBKGWFEU-yluJkL-.description: Dive into our dynamic world, join one of five Houses, and showcase your skills. Engage in coding challenges, collaborate on innovative projects, and earn stars for your contributions and problem solving skills. Praxis Hub is an action-oriented community of innovators and creators at the frontier of technology.

-MiBsknNSQ6aBG1-2lQS.title: Create Reward System for Houses to compete
-MiBsknNSQ6aBG1-2lQS.description: Users will earn stars for completing challenges and winning competitions

-MiBuCve4-r_H-RLUOh2.title: Track baby development through pregnancy and early years
-MiBuCve4-r_H-RLUOh2.description: Users can keep track of appointments, develop a plan and learn about baby development

-MiBuU13EaKmGOMjJF-X.title: Develop Concept
-MiBuU13EaKmGOMjJF-X.description: The game environment is a futuristic colony where players need to advance a level and reach the surface

-MiBuqoYjFwbXyA8oiiw.title: There are 9 levels the player needs to complete
-MiBuqoYjFwbXyA8oiiw.description: Each level is divided into subsection

-MiBvEFJTI3FmTzDu_3V.title: There are dungeon type monsters in each level
-MiBvEFJTI3FmTzDu_3V.description: player must fight monsters to advance to next level and collect XP

-MiBvW8ME_DvO2GzwQ8D.title: Uniscript players must defeat evil bunnies
-MiBvW8ME_DvO2GzwQ8D.description: By learning javascript the player helps uniscript acquire power to defeat the evil bunnies

-MiBvf3bIyooE6x4nLLB.title: The player chooses a Uniscript avatar
-MiBvf3bIyooE6x4nLLB.description: Through completing challenges the Uniscript gains stars

-MiBwAF5wOY00AYJm7cR.title: Mini Lessons, reward system
-MiBwAF5wOY00AYJm7cR.description: The lessons should be short like a fun game and the player will earn rewards for completing one each day
